data.title: About LeafGuard Gutters
data.meta_description: At LeafGuard, commitment to quality is at the heart of everything we do. We strive to exceed the expectations of our customers, employees and communities. Learn more.
data.text:
Our Story

In 1993, after years of intense product research and development, Englert, Inc. introduced the LeafGuardÂ® brand gutter, a proprietary one-piece leaf and debris shedding gutter system. The LeafGuard gutter system revolutionized the industry by providing an innovative one-piece system for residential and commercial application, with a lifetime, clog-free guarantee. Today, the LeafGuard brand continues to be a trusted source for quality and reliability, backed by the Good Housekeeping seal.

Englert's LeafGuard brand is available through a national network of authorized dealers, and supported by Englert, Inc., the pioneer of on-site custom fitted, seamless gutters since 1966.
